Name: Zombie Hotel
About the game: Zombie Hotel is an arcade style shoot-em up game, where the player has to fight their way threw a Zombie infested hotel. The player has to scavenge for weapons, to fight for survival and stay alive. Ammo is not something you should waste, so make sure each shot counts! Enjoy your stay at the Zombie Hotel.
